Champaign.Presence Covenant Medical Center:
Presence Covenant Medical Center, now owned by OSF HealthCare and named OSF Heart of Mary Medical Center, formerly Provena Covenant Medical Center is a 210-bed non-profit hospital in Urbana, Illinois, USA. It is part of the Presence Health healthcare system, headquartered in Chicago. Presence Covenant is accredited by the Joint Commission and the Commission on Accreditation of Rehabilitation Facilities (CARF).


== History ==
Presence Covenant Medical Center was formed by the merging of two hospitals, Burnham City Hospital and Mercy Hospital, in 1989.
